name: Rhode Island Clam Chowder Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Enjoy the game at home with a warm and comforting dip based on the New England favorite--Clam Chowder. Creamy, Cheddar-cheesy and loaded with smoky bacon and clams, it's best enjoyed on toasted baguette or water crackers. Touch down!
ingredients: 1 package McCormick® Original Country Gravy Mix
1 cup shredded white Cheddar cheese, divided
directions: Cook bacon in large skillet on medium-high heat until crisp
Remove bacon, reserving drippings in pan
Add onion; cook and stir 2 to 3 minutes or until translucent
Stir in Gravy Mix, milk and 1/2 cup of the shredded cheese
Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes or until gravy starts to thicken
Bake 15 minutes or until cheese is melted
Serve with toasted baguette slices or crackers
